definition: scheming/shrewdness
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
surname Ji
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
scheming/calculating

sentences.english: Yi Yi surprised to learn the truth and exasperated, accusing children s four seasons in calculating.
sentences.chinese: 易奕獲知真相驚怒交加，指責童四季攻於心計。

sentences.english: Enrico was too good, an old fox, cunning.
sentences.chinese: 恩里科很有心計，是一隻狡猾的老狐狸。

sentences.english: Her husband was a clown, a child of nature, without guile.
sentences.chinese: 她的丈夫是一個笨拙粗魯的人，孩子性，沒有心計。

sentences.english: A fool always comes short of his reckoning.
I never realized you could be so calculating.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有想到你會這樣有心計。

sentences.english: That list of contrast men, maybe good at calculation.
sentences.chinese: 那種表裏反差強烈的男人，也許是善於心計的。

sentences.english: Mediocrities bother to spend her time will be, homo habilis had shrewd use of our time.
sentences.chinese: 庸人費心將是消磨時光，能人費盡心計利用時間。

sentences.english: Example : She caught a coolly calculating glint in the other woman's eye.
sentences.chinese: 她看到另一個女人眼中閃現冷厲而有心計的眼光。
